about_the_game:
Experience the Wavey The Rocket Soundtrack like never before. Huge bass lines, cutting synth and a funk that will make you bop your head up and down all the way to space!

This is a fully original soundtrack composed by Thomas O'Boyle.

25 tracks, totaling 97 mins. and includes both MP3 and WAV files.
You'll find the files in you Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\music\Wavey The Rocket Soundtrack

Tack List:
1 Good 2 Groove
2 Wavey's Gotta Groove
3 A World 4 Wavez
4 Street Vibin'
5 Sweet Streets
6 A Lil' Bonus Somethin'
7 Grandmaster Blaster
8 No Train No Gain
9 Pipes Galore
10 Plumbin' The Depths
11 Factory Reset
12 Boomswing Kickin'
13 We're Goin' Underground
14 Say Hello To Mr. Pinchy
15 Stellar
16 The Tombs Comsumes
17 You Woke Up The Guardian
18 Starcadium
19 Continue?
20 Into The Void
21 An Infernal Place
22 Meet Vile
23 Evil2 HQ
24 Belly Of The Beast
25 The Waves Shall Crash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 233 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1000 MB available space

short_description: Experience the sounds of Wavey The Rocket in this fully original soundtrack composed by Thomas O'Boyle.
